Detailed Description

Basic timer class. Uses gettimeofday() function.

Member Function Documentation

void Timer::start (  )  [inline]

"Start" timer: save current time.

unsigned long Timer::stop (  )  [inline]

"Stop" timer: get current time and subtract from start time. Returns microseconds since start().
